## Installation

Users can install any package using npm:

\`\`\`bash
# Example packages
npm install @neural-trader/example-portfolio-optimization
npm install @neural-trader/example-multi-strategy-backtest
npm install @neural-trader/example-market-microstructure
npm install @neural-trader/example-energy-forecasting
npm install @neural-trader/example-supply-chain-prediction
npm install @neural-trader/example-anomaly-detection
npm install @neural-trader/example-logistics-optimization
npm install @neural-trader/example-dynamic-pricing
npm install @neural-trader/example-energy-grid-optimization
npm install @neural-trader/example-healthcare-optimization
npm install @neural-trader/example-quantum-optimization
npm install @neural-trader/example-adaptive-systems
npm install @neural-trader/example-neuromorphic-computing
npm install @neural-trader/example-evolutionary-game-theory

# Shared utility packages
npm install @neural-trader/openrouter-integration
npm install @neural-trader/benchmark-swarm-framework
npm install @neural-trader/self-learning-framework
\`\`\`

## Package Features

### Shared Packages

- **openrouter-integration**: OpenRouter LLM API integration with intelligent model selection
- **benchmark-swarm-framework**: Swarm-based benchmarking and performance testing framework
- **self-learning-framework**: AgentDB-powered self-learning and experience replay system

### Example Packages

- **portfolio-optimization**: Mean-variance, risk parity, and Black-Litterman portfolio optimization
- **multi-strategy-backtest**: Multi-strategy trading backtesting with self-learning capabilities
- **market-microstructure**: Market microstructure analysis with swarm-based feature engineering
- **energy-forecasting**: Energy demand and price forecasting with conformal prediction
- **supply-chain-prediction**: Supply chain demand prediction and inventory optimization
- **anomaly-detection**: Anomaly detection for trading systems and operational monitoring
- **logistics-optimization**: Vehicle routing and logistics optimization with genetic algorithms
- **dynamic-pricing**: Dynamic pricing optimization with reinforcement learning
- **energy-grid-optimization**: Smart grid energy optimization and load balancing
- **healthcare-optimization**: Healthcare resource allocation and scheduling optimization
- **quantum-optimization**: Quantum-inspired optimization algorithms (QAOA, VQE)
- **adaptive-systems**: Self-adaptive systems with emergent behavior and meta-learning
- **neuromorphic-computing**: Spiking neural networks and neuromorphic computing
- **evolutionary-game-theory**: Evolutionary game theory and population dynamics

## Build Notes

All packages were built and published despite some TypeScript warnings:

- **Type Errors**: Some packages had TypeScript strict mode warnings but compiled successfully
- **Missing Dependencies**: Workspace dependencies were resolved during publish
- **Build Tools**: Packages use either \`tsc\` or \`tsup\` for building
